code: import React from'react';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faPenToSquare}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{faTrash}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Todo(_ref){let{task,deleteTodo,editTodo,toggleComplete}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Todo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"".concat(task.completed?"completed":"incompleted"),onClick:()=>toggleComplete(task.id),children:task.task}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{className:"edit-icon",icon:faPenToSquare,onClick:()=>editTodo(task.id)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{className:"delete-icon",icon:faTrash,onClick:()=>deleteTodo(task.id)})]})]});}export default Todo;
